page.title: 12LIVING IN BALLYUTOAG
page.content: Jacqueline Windrum lives on a farm in Ballyutoag. She is 14 years old. With her parents both involved in running the farm, she has to help around the house but she still has plenty of time for recreation. She watches television for 2-3 hours per day on average. Her favourite programmes are Coronation Street and Dallas. She also enjoys quiz programmes such as Connections, Blockbusters and Busman's Holiday. Jacqueline is a member of a number of organisations. One is Lylehill Young Farmers Club which meets once a fortnight from September to April. Its varied programme includes demonstrations such as pottery, hairdressing, keep-fit and glassblowing. Continued next page.
